classes.name: type_info
classes.description: Provides information about a type during runtime.

functions.name: name
functions.description: Returns a null-terminated character string containing the mangled name of the type.

functions.name: before
functions.description: Compares two type_info objects for ordering.

parameters.name: rhs
parameters.description: The type_info object to compare with.

functions.name: hash_code
functions.description: Returns a hash code for the type.
